issue.title: [C++] Add support for additional file formats in Substrait consumer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15588](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15588). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At the moment Substrait only supports parquet.  This will be insufficient for Arrow.  I've opened https://github.com/substrait-io/substrait/issues/138 to start the discussion into additional formats.

Once some kind of mechanism is adopted we should add support in the C++ Substrait consumer for the new mechanism.
